content: free pattern released with a full time job many commissions i do my best to bring you free patterns at least one pattern each week i hope you enjoy making my pattern i love the outcome of the gnomes santa gnome looks super cute to me i make 2 versions of the hat the short version is for those who want to turn santa gnome into an ornament ❤️ as always i m sharing free patterns - my intellectual property with love so please kindly credit/ tag me as designer when you repost my patterns or post your work using my patterns ❤️ follow me for more upcoming free patterns keep calm and crochet on
